result.title: Binary Search
result.content:
https://www.codechef.com/MAY16/problems/FORESTGA

i tried many right limits !

left = 0; right = 1e18 + w ; with these limits WA for test case 14

and for left = 0; right = 1e18;

test case 8,12,14 gives WA

i cant understand why is this happening !!

as far as i know if i increase the limit it should affect my time complexity not the answer

i know contest is going on but i just wanted to know the reason for getting WA for different limits!

green tick motivates me !!!
